text: God takaw adek omɨŋal agak ak, olap takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkɨl agak takaw ak, olap God Eblaham nop gɨnɨgayn agɨl aglak takaw ak. Pen takaw omɨŋal anɨb ak penpen ma gɨpil. Mel yɨbɨl. Binɨb suŋtep yenɨgel agɨl Mosis takaw olap agobɨkop, kɨli Mosis takaw anɨb ak kɨdek gɨl koŋɨm amel, mɨdtep gɨpɨkop. Pen Mosis takaw anɨb ak kɨlop gek mɨdtep gɨnɨgel tek ma lup.
